title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 403.6 - Fair hearings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 403.6 - Fair hearings

State Regulations

In accordance with Part 358 of this Title, an applicant
for a service whose application has been denied or not acted upon within 30
days or a recipient of a service whose service has been reduced or terminated
by a social services district, shall be entitled to a fair hearing by the
department, provided the request is made within 60 days after such action or
failure to act. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18

403.6

York State Register June 3, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 22, eff. 6/3/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
